#summary This page shows JavaScript code before and after Joose was applied

= The Point class =

A simple class with two attributes (x and y) using the namespace Test

= Before Joose =
{{{
// No Joose
if(Test == null) {
    Test = {};
}

Test.StandardPoint = function (x, y) {
    this.x = x || 0
    this.y = y || 0
}

Test.StandardPoint.prototype = {
    getX: function () {
        return this.x
    },
    setX: function (x) {
        this.x = x
    },
    getY: function () {
        return this.y
    },
    setY: function (y) {
        this.y = y;
    },
    clear: function () {
        this.setX(0)
        this.setY(0)
    }
}
}}}

== After Joose ==
{{{
Module("Test", function (m) {
    Class("Point", {
        has: {
            x: {
                is:   "rw",
                init: 0
            },
            y: {
                is:   "rw",
                init: 0
            }
        },
        methods: {
            clear: function () {
                this.setX(0);
                this.setY(0);
            }
        }
    })
})
}}}
